title: Atlantic City, New Jersey
summary: Atlantic City, often known by its initials A.C., is a coastal resort city in Atlantic County, New Jersey, United States, known for its casinos, boardwalk, and beaches. In 2020, the city had a population of 37,743.[12][21][22][23][14][24] It was incorporated on May 1, 1854, from portions of Egg Harbor Township and Galloway Township.[25] It is located on Absecon Island and borders Absecon, Brigantine, Pleasantville, Ventnor City, Egg Harbor Township, and the Atlantic Ocean.
